description: This file defines the APIs and data structures for managing 'Hosts' objects within a Data Model Library, including functions to get and set parameters, manage object entries, and handle synchronization, validation, commit, and rollback operations.

methods.name: Hosts_GetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Retrieves a boolean parameter value for the Hosts object.

methods.name: Hosts_GetParamIntValue
methods.description: Retrieves an integer parameter value for the Hosts object.

methods.name: Hosts_GetParamUlongValue
methods.description: Retrieves an unsigned long parameter value for the Hosts object.

methods.name: Hosts_GetParamStringValue
methods.description: Retrieves a string parameter value for the Hosts object.

methods.name: Host_GetEntryCount
methods.description: Gets the number of Host entries.

methods.name: Host_GetEntry
methods.description: Retrieves a specific Host entry by index.

methods.name: Host_IsUpdated
methods.description: Checks if a Host entry has been updated.

methods.name: Host_Synchronize
methods.description: Synchronizes the Host entries with the data source.

methods.name: Host_GetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Gets a boolean parameter value for a specific Host.

methods.name: Host_GetParamIntValue
methods.description: Gets an integer parameter value for a specific Host.

methods.name: Host_GetParamUlongValue
methods.description: Gets an unsigned long parameter value for a specific Host.

methods.name: Host_GetParamStringValue
methods.description: Gets a string parameter value for a specific Host.

methods.name: Host_SetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Sets a boolean parameter value for a specific Host.

methods.name: Host_SetParamIntValue
methods.description: Sets an integer parameter value for a specific Host.

methods.name: Host_SetParamUlongValue
methods.description: Sets an unsigned long parameter value for a specific Host.

methods.name: Host_SetParamStringValue
methods.description: Sets a string parameter value for a specific Host.

methods.name: Host_Validate
methods.description: Validates the parameters before committing changes for a Host.

methods.name: Host_Commit
methods.description: Commits the changes made to a Host.

methods.name: Host_Rollback
methods.description: Reverts changes to a Host if validation or commit fails.
